lead_paragraph: The unseeded Czech Radek Stepanek upset the tournament favorite, James Blake, 7-6 (7), 5-7, 6-2, to clinch his second ATP title at the Los Angeles Classic yesterday. Stepanek broke the second-seeded Blake twice in the final set to seal victory in 2 hours 20 minutes at the Los Angeles Tennis Center. Stepanek took a medical timeout late in the match to have treatment on his left hamstring.
